decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.
Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered Location Plan and FP 10. Received: 09/12/2024
A101, A102 and A103. Received: 27/02/2025
A104. Received: 03/03/2025].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed on the building hereby permitted without the prior written approval of the local planning authority.
Reason: In order to protect the appearance of the area and neighbours' living conditions.

Condition : 4 - No deliveries or collections (including refuse and recyclable materials) shall be carried out at the approved commercial premises except between the hours of 7:00am and 10:00pm from Monday to Saturday, and 9:00am and 1:00pm on Sundays.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions.

Condition : 5 - Customers shall only be permitted on the premises between the following hours:

0630 � 1900 on  Mondays � Saturdays;
0800 � 1900 on Sundays and on Bank or Public Holidays

Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions. 

Note:  If this approved use requires a trading licence from the Council (for example, because you intend to sell alcohol or offer entertainment) you should obtain this before you start to trade and note that the Licensing Panel will enquire about and wish you to disclose the terms of this permission and will likely align the terms of the licence with those set out here.  If your licence application seeks to exceed these hours, you will first need to have sought and obtained formally a variation to this condition by making a planning application.
description: Relocation of the entrance door of the ground floor unit.
subdivision_of_building: Ground floor commercial unit of the building
